metadata.description: Meatcutters care deeply about the food we eat. They not only prepare the various cuts of meat with great precision, but also teach us about animal products, contributing to healthy lifestyles.

markdown:
Skip to main content

![meatcutter](/sites/default/files/2023-02/MeatCutter%20%28YOUTH%29.jpg)

As a Meatcutter, you’ll continue one of the world’s oldest trades as you prepare and handle various animal products. 

You’ll be an expert in safety and hygiene, as well as an inventive and creative artisan. You’ll also be on your feet working behind the scenes in a refrigerated room or behind a retail counter sharing your expert knowledge and filling orders. 

#### What You'll Learn

  * How to cut, trim and prepare standard cuts of meat 
  * How to grind meats and slice cooked meats 
  * How to cure, smoke, tenderize and preserve meat 
  * How to order and manage inventory 
  * How to inspect, handle, prepare and store meat safely 



#### Key Job Skills

  * Safety and sanitation standards 
  * Inventory and cost controls 
  * Meat science and nutrition 
  * Inspecting, grading, handling and storage 
  * Cutting procedures for beef, veal, pork, lamb, poultry, fish and game 



#### Technical Training

To get certified, you will need to sign up for technical training at an approved training provider in addition to on-the-job training. 

Visit [Trades Training BC](https://www.tradestrainingbc.ca/) and [EducationPlannerBC](https://educationplannerbc.ca/search) for a comprehensive list of what programs are available in your trade at public and non-public schools. 

Technical Training 8 weeks over 2 years 

Work-Based Training

4500 HOURS

General Skills

[Creative](/find-your-trade?f%5B0%5D=skills_taxonomy_term_name%3ACreative) [Expressive](/find-your-trade?f%5B0%5D=skills_taxonomy_term_name%3AExpressive) [Precise](/find-your-trade?f%5B0%5D=skills_taxonomy_term_name%3APrecise) [Visual](/find-your-trade?f%5B0%5D=skills_taxonomy_term_name%3AVisual)

Program Updates

August 2020: [Changes to the Program Outline and Assessment Guidelines](/media/649/download)

A VALID [FOODSAFE](http://www.foodsafe.ca/courses/level-1.html) Level 1 Certification or [equivalent](http://www.bccdc.ca/resource-gallery/Documents/Guidelines%20and%20Forms/Guidelines%20and%20Manuals/EH/FPS/Food/Food_Handlers_Training_Courses_Equivalent_to_BC_FOODSAFE_Level_1.pdf) is a pre-requisite to challenge this certification.

## 

Program Information

#### [Program Profile Occupational Description Meatcutters break down carcasses, cut meat to industry specifications using hand and power tools in a safe and sanitary manner, and have a basic understanding of handling meat carcasses. They order, handle and prepare seafood products, manufacture prepared meat products, and handle cured meat products for sale. They also have knowledge of ordering and inventory control and of human and customer relations.  View Profile](/media/648/download)

#### [Program Outline Guidelines for delivery of technical training at SkilledTradesBC Recognized Training Providers View PDF](/media/647/download)

## 

Challenge the Trade

If you have significant work experience in a trade but have never been certified in Canada, you may apply to challenge the certification. Learn more about [How to Challenge a Skilled Trade](/challenge-skilled-trade).

OR

If you sponsor apprentices but have never been certified in Canada, you may request to supervise and sign-off apprentices when they are ready to be certified. Please [contact customer service](/contact-us) for more information.

#### [Instructions How to Apply View](https://skilledtradesbc.ca/instructions-challenge-certification) #### [Online Application Sign up for the Portal to start your online application Start Application](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/Account/Login/Register?registrationType=certified) #### [Employer Declaration Document of relevant work experience View PDF](/media/898/download) #### [Statutory Declaration Attestation for self-employment/work experience when employer cannot be contacted View PDF](/media/899/download)
